summary: Half-giants are a race of enormous demihumans who have adapted to a variety of lifestyles in the many harsh terrains of Athas. The origins of the race are unclear. While it is known that the race is spawned from the union of human and giant and the nature of that union was certainly magical, its original purpose is unknown. Left to themselves, the
descriptionHtml:
The Half-Giant was created for anyone that wanted to be bigger, more resilient at the start. Starter character has more health and stamina but very small amount of magicka to start. Can carry more at the start as well and has the Giants Magicka resistance power (couldnt get the foot stomp to work(?)(anyone?)) Just big enough to go through doorways

uploaded an update file with some added facial features and narrowed the bonus starter skills to the following:

Two Handed 10
Heavy Armor 10
Enchanting 10
Smithing 5
